EDUCATION.Institute Name: GLA Institute of Technology and Management

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: A consumer App (for Android users) designed for GSM prepaid subscribers. Uses intelligent technologies to understand balance messages and help users keep track of balances and deductions. Also provides detailed summary of mobile data usage.

A typical transportation problem deals with sources where supply of a commodity is available and destinations where this commodity is demanded. Aim of transportation model is to find out optimum transportation schedule keeping in mind that cost of transportation is to be minimized. Transportation  problem was part of our engg syllabus and we were tired of finding its optimal solution by applying various complex methods manually. So we decided to automate this.
